QuestData.Title: Lifetimes To Consider
QuestData.Description:
This song has been completed, and harmony has been restored. Yet Zereth Mortis remains haunted by discord.
Dissonance lingers still, outside these walls. We must leave before it finds us.
Speak with the one you call Firim--he will open the way.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kleia back at Exile's Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: I can hardly believe all we've accomplished... truly, this is a day worth remembering. We could not have achieved this without you, my friend.
